trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 扩展设计时行为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"> </xref> Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxDesigner class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class to ensure that the control is displayed with a meaningful representation at design time.
trans-unit.target: CheckBoxDesigner 类替代<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类，以确保使用有意义的表示形式，在设计时显示的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method of this class sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property of the control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>属性为空，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>此类的方法会设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>该控件的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的控件属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于在设计时表示控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> property is empty or consists only of white space, then the generated HTML contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> of the check box control; otherwise, the generated HTML contains the contents of the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A>属性为空或仅包含空格，则生成的 HTML 包含<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>的复选框控件中; 否则，生成的 HTML 将包含控件的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override this method to change the generated HTML.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法可以更改生成的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 用于在设计时表示控件的标记。
